title: Step 77

challengeFiles.name: index
challengeFiles.contents: CSS Color Markers
challengeFiles.seed: CSS Color Markers

challengeFiles.name: styles

tests.text: You should use a class selector to target the class cap.
Your .cap CSS rule should have a width property set to 60px.
Your .cap CSS rule should have a height property set to 25px.

description: Create a new CSS rule to target the class cap. In the new rule, set the width property to 60px, and the height to 25px.
